page.title: 18A DAY IN THE LIFE OF..
page.content: My name is{Daniel Chugg.}I am twelve years old and live in Exeter. My alarm goes off at about 7.10 and Mum comes in with a cup of tea at about 7.25. I usually take my time getting up, dressed and washed. I often finish this at about 7.45. then I go downstairs to a{breakfast}of bacon and scrambled egg then finish getting ready for school and I leave at approximately 8.20. In an average day at{school}we have; assembly, maths, break, language, french, lunch, humanities and the last lesson varies. As soon as I get{home}I have a drink and relax for a few minutes. Homework is next, then supper. After this I will either have a music lesson, or do some practice. Next I will play, or watch television, then {go to bed}at around ten o'clock.
